Description: Ostracon, fragment of the body of a pale-red pottery vessel, the fabric is relatively coarse and contains many small white inclusions, with remains of three lines of black-painted demotic text on the interior, the exterior is covered with a self-slip.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (393790) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/393790)
